result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Jerome Yegger was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael Jerome Yegger is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Michael Jerome Yegger was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
AS TO COUNT 2:
Court ordered defendant to pay a fine/forfeiture of $200.00 plus all applicable court costs and fees at a rate of $50.00 a month effective August 1, 2015, until paid.  Failure to pay will be docketed as a civil judgment.

Defendant Michael Jerome Yegger in court with attorney Anne A. Devitt.  James C. Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

AS TO COUNT 1:
On motion of the State, Court ordered COUNT 1 dismissed.

AS TO COUNT 2:
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Court found the defendant guilty.  Judgment of conviction entered.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Defendant's Proposed Jury Instructions.

Defendant Michael Jerome Yegger in court with attorney Anne A. Devitt.  Lucy Kronforst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for July 8, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Michael Jerome Yegger in court with attorney Anne A. Devitt.  Lucy Kronforst appeared for James C. Griffin for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Michael Jerome Yegger in court with attorney Anne A. Devitt.  James C. Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Discovery incomplete.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Tabbed to Judge Donald in error.

Defendant Michael Jerome Yegger in court with attorney Anne A. Devitt.  Joanne L Hardtke for James Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Parties not ready to proceed with a scheduling conference today.
State advised the Court that this case was tabbed to Br. 2 in error; should be tabbed to Br. 26, Judge Pocan.
Statements made.
Case adjourned to 03-11-2015 at 8:30 AM - Br. 26, Judge Pocan's Court for Adjourned Scheduling Conference.

FILED, Justice Point Pretrial Report.
Received and filed with court.

Defendant Michael Jerome Yegger in court with attorney Anne A. Devitt.  David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Donald, Branch 02.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Court enters a not guilty plea on behalf of the defendant. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Filed, Justice Point Pretrial Program Report dated 2/10/15.
